title: test/run: replace shell script with go program
body:
The idea is to make the test directory run with

cd test
go run run.go

If you are testing a possibly buggy compiler, you
back up to somewhere you trust and go build run.go
and copy the executable into your buggy world
instead of using 'go run'.

Eliminates the bash script.  Should also eliminate
the Perl errchk script.

The comments at the top of the file might be 
simplified too.  Ian may have good ideas about
this since he has to handle them specially in
gccgo already.
